actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commodity Exchanges, Energy, and Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development

official_title: To modernize the authority of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to conduct research, development, demonstration, and information programs.
short_title: Commodity Futures Trading Commission Research and Development Modernization Act

summary.text:
Commodity Futures Trading Commission Research and Development Modernization Act 

This bill directs the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to establish and maintain research, development, demonstration, and information programs regarding emerging technologies and their application to commodities markets. The commission may establish research and development plans for such programs. The bill provides requirements for transactions and nonmonetary contributions related to such programs.

titles.title: To modernize the authority of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to conduct research, development, demonstration, and information programs.
Commodity Futures Trading Commission Research and Development Modernization Act
